data.Name: Battle shout
data.Description: Increases melee attack power by 5% and health by 5%, lasts 30s

data.Name: Taste for blood
data.Description:
Next 3 melee attacks regenerate 3% of your total health and deal 75% of your 
							 weapon damage + 10% of your total melee power

data.Name: Shield slam
data.Description:
Deals damage equal to 10% of your shields armor value + 25% of your
							 melee power, has 50% chance to stun the target for 3s

data.Name: Pyro blast
data.Description:
Deals 125% of your spell power as fire damage, causes the target 
						     to burn for 10% of the damage over 3s

data.Name: Frost blast
data.Description:
Deals 50% of your spell power as frost damage, causes the target
							 to slow down by 50% for 3s

data.Name: Mana blast
data.Description:
Deals 40% of your spell power as magical damage, grants mana blast
							 debuff that increases the total cost of the spell by 3% and increases the
							 damage dealt by mana blast or your next spell by 100%, stacks up to
							 5 times, lasts 4s

data.Name: Magic missile
data.Description:
Shoot a magical missile towards your target, deals 30% of your spell power
							 as magical damage

data.Name: Frost nova
data.Description:
Root all enemies in 3 meter radius for 5 seconds, deals 10% of your spell
							 power as frost damage
